channel.title: I keep getting error
channel.description:
Can somebody please help me get my server online for everyone.. Willing to team view etc.
What I've done: - Changed all IP's to my host name (Check) - Port is open (Check) - Server Port = 43594 (Check) - Environmental Variables (Check) - Portforwarded (Check) Problem: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/23vny35.jpg[/img]
You see how its connected through 127.0.0.1, and using a whole different port? Is this the problem? If so, does anyone know a fix?

item.title: I keep getting error
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:9, topic:540320”]Did you add an exception in your firewall?[/quote]His port is clearly not blocked.

OP try another server and client to rule out the possibility of this being a client issue.

edit: This is a file issue (ie you haven’t extracted the server files into the correct places) - either try another or extract properly.

Read full topic

Did you add an exception in your firewall?

item.title: I keep getting error
item.dc:creator: @Vexii Vexii
item.description:
@Vexii wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

Is your client/server set to use port 43594? Sometimes they use 55555.

I’ve searched Server.java and don’t find “55555”

Add my skype if you can Vexinator_RS

public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; // 43594=default

Read full topic

item.title: I keep getting error

item.description:

Is your client/server set to use port 43594? Sometmies they use 55555.

item.title: I keep getting error
item.dc:creator: @Vexii Vexii
item.description:
@Vexii wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

Go to canyouseeme and enter your ip address and port to see if you’ve actually ported your server correctly.

Success: I can see your service on (x.x.x.x) on port (43594)
Your ISP is not blocking port 43594

But I still get error connecting… It works when I have U-torrent Open (Note: I am portforwarded) The port is open when U-torrent is open, but I can’t get on the server, Closed U-torrent, now the port is unsuccessful on canyouseeme… help? Add my skype Vexinator_RS

Read full topic

item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Are you sure the IP address you’re pointing the portforward to is your local PCs? Check cmd ipconfig to make sure.
